prefetch-stream.cpp

00001 /* prefetch-stream.cpp: Stream-based prefetcher.  [See DPL/DCU description in the "Intel 64 and
00002    IA-32 Architecture Optimization Refernce Manual"] */
00003 /*
00004  * __COPYRIGHT__ GT
00005  */
00006 #define COMPONENT_NAME "stream"
00007 
00008 
00009 #ifdef PREFETCH_PARSE_ARGS
00010 if(!strcasecmp(COMPONENT_NAME,type))
00011 {
00012   int num_upstream_entries;
00013   int num_downstream_entries;
00014   if(sscanf(opt_string,"%*[^:]:%d:%d",&num_upstream_entries,&num_downstream_entries) != 2)
00015     fatal("bad %s prefetcher options string %s (should be \"stream:num_upstream_entries:num_downstream_entries\")",cp->name,opt_string);
00016   return new prefetch_stream_t(cp,num_upstream_entries,num_downstream_entries);
00017 }
00018 #else
00019 
00020 class prefetch_stream_t:public prefetch_t
00021 {
00022   protected:
00023   int num_upstream_entries;
00024   int num_downstream_entries;
00025 
00026   struct prefetch_stream_table_t {
00027     md_paddr_t last_paddr;
00028     struct prefetch_stream_table_t * next;
00029   };
00030 
00031   struct prefetch_stream_table_t * upstream;
00032   struct prefetch_stream_table_t * downstream;
00033   struct prefetch_stream_table_t * upstream_head;
00034   struct prefetch_stream_table_t * downstream_head;
00035 
00036   public:
00037   /* CREATE */
00038   prefetch_stream_t(struct cache_t * arg_cp,
00039                 int arg_num_upstream_entries,
00040                 int arg_num_downstream_entries)
00041   {
00042     init();
00043 
00044     char name[256]; /* just used for error checking macros */
00045 
00046     type = strdup("stream");
00047     if(!type)
00048       fatal("couldn't calloc stream-prefetch type (strdup)");
00049 
00050     assert(arg_cp);
00051     cp = arg_cp;
00052     sprintf(name,"%s.%s",cp->name,type);
00053 
00054     num_upstream_entries = arg_num_upstream_entries;
00055     num_downstream_entries = arg_num_downstream_entries;
00056 
00057     upstream = (struct prefetch_stream_t::prefetch_stream_table_t*) calloc(num_upstream_entries,sizeof(*upstream));
00058     downstream = (struct prefetch_stream_t::prefetch_stream_table_t*) calloc(num_downstream_entries,sizeof(*downstream));
00059     if(!upstream || !downstream)
00060       fatal("couldn't calloc stream-prefetch table(s)");
00061 
00062     for(int i=0;i<num_upstream_entries-1;i++)
00063       upstream[i].next = &upstream[i+1];
00064     for(int i=0;i<num_downstream_entries-1;i++)
00065       downstream[i].next = &downstream[i+1];
00066     upstream_head = upstream;
00067     downstream_head = downstream;
00068 
00069     bits = (num_upstream_entries+num_downstream_entries) * (40-12); /* assume 40-bit physical addres, 4KB pages */
00070   }
00071 
00072   /* DESTROY */
00073   ~prefetch_stream_t()
00074   {
00075     free(upstream); upstream = upstream_head = NULL;
00076     free(downstream); downstream = downstream_head = NULL;
00077   }
00078 
00079   /* LOOKUP */
00080   PREFETCH_LOOKUP_HEADER
00081   {
00082     lookups++;
00083 
00084     md_paddr_t page_addr = paddr & ~(PAGE_SIZE-1);
00085 
00086     /* see if we can find a matching entry */
00087     struct prefetch_stream_table_t * p = upstream_head;
00088     struct prefetch_stream_table_t * prev = NULL;
00089     bool possible_up = false;
00090     bool possible_down = false;
00091     bool up_hit = false; /* page present */
00092     bool down_hit = false; /* page present */
00093 
00094     /* check upstreams */
00095     while(p)
00096     {
00097       if(page_addr == (p->last_paddr & ~(PAGE_SIZE-1))) /* hit */
00098       {
00099         up_hit = true;
00100         break;
00101       }
00102       prev = p;
00103       p = p->next;
00104     }
00105 
00106     if(p) /* hit */
00107     {
00108       if((paddr>>cp->addr_shift) == ((p->last_paddr>>cp->addr_shift)+1))
00109       {
00110         p->last_paddr = paddr; /* record this address */
00111 
00112         if(prev) /* entry to MRU position */
00113         {
00114           prev->next = p->next;
00115           p->next = upstream_head;
00116           upstream_head = p;
00117         }
00118         return paddr + (1<<cp->addr_shift);
00119       }
00120       else if((paddr>>cp->addr_shift) == ((p->last_paddr>>cp->addr_shift)-1))
00121       {
00122         /* possible downward-stream */
00123         possible_down = true;
00124       }
00125     }
00126 
00127     /* check downstreams */
00128     p = downstream_head;
00129     prev = NULL;
00130     while(p)
00131     {
00132       if(page_addr == (p->last_paddr & ~(PAGE_SIZE-1))) /* hit */
00133       {
00134         down_hit = true;
00135         break;
00136       }
00137       prev = p;
00138       p = p->next;
00139     }
00140 
00141     if(p) /* hit */
00142     {
00143       if((paddr>>cp->addr_shift) == ((p->last_paddr>>cp->addr_shift)-1))
00144       {
00145         p->last_paddr = paddr; /* record this address */
00146 
00147         if(prev) /* entry to MRU position */
00148         {
00149           prev->next = p->next;
00150           p->next = downstream_head;
00151           downstream_head = p;
00152         }
00153         return paddr - (1<<cp->addr_shift);
00154       }
00155       else if((paddr>>cp->addr_shift) == ((p->last_paddr>>cp->addr_shift)+1))
00156       {
00157         /* possible upward-stream */
00158         possible_up = true;
00159       }
00160     }
00161 
00162     if((!up_hit && !down_hit) || (!up_hit && possible_up))
00163     {
00164       /* we don't know about this page; just allocate an entry in the upstream
00165          table */
00166       p = upstream_head; prev = NULL;
00167       while(p->next)
00168       {
00169         prev = p;
00170         p = p->next;
00171       }
00172 
00173       assert(p);
00174       p->last_paddr = paddr;
00175 
00176       if(prev) /* entry to MRU position */
00177       {
00178         prev->next = p->next;
00179         p->next = upstream_head;
00180         upstream_head = p;
00181       }
00182     }
00183     else if(!down_hit && possible_down)
00184     {
00185       p = downstream_head; prev = NULL;
00186       while(p->next)
00187       {
00188         prev = p;
00189         p = p->next;
00190       }
00191 
00192       assert(p);
00193       p->last_paddr = paddr;
00194 
00195       if(prev) /* entry to MRU position */
00196       {
00197         prev->next = p->next;
00198         p->next = downstream_head;
00199         downstream_head = p;
00200       }
00201     }
00202 
00203     return 0; /* nothing to prefetch */
00204   }
00205 };
00206 
00207 
00208 #endif /* PREFETCH_PARSE_ARGS */
00209 #undef COMPONENT_NAME
